metadata.name: Rattle Society Backstage Token
metadata.description:
Welcome to Rattle Society: a token-gated private collective of the brave & the curious enjoying backstage access to The Rattle's underground creator ecosystem. All proceeds contribute to developing pioneering new models to support them - creating new art and culture for us all.

We Rattle Society together. The Backstage Token includes:

> Entry to private parties, showcases, dinners, tech demos, hackathons, workshops and rallying cries etc. hosted at The Rattle 
> Hive-mind access to The Rattle Discord - from virtual investor rooms to job boards etc.
> Entry to Rattle Live festivals across the globe
> Unique purchasable token-holder only VIP passes, backstage parties, tour-bus ride-alongs etc. from The Rattle ecosystem
> Drop-2+ access to the 'Rattle Ventures Security Token'
> Become a Discord member of The Rattle
